title: The Gingerbread Man's Creation
desc: Explore the beginning of the story where the old woman bakes the gingerbread man and he comes to life.
prompt_en: Tell me about how the gingerbread man was created and what happened right after he was baked.
prompt_zh: 請告訴我薑餅人是如何被製作出來的，以及他烤好後發生了什麼事。
sample_questions: Why did the old woman decide to bake a gingerbread man?
What ingredients did she use to decorate the gingerbread man?
How did the gingerbread man come to life?

title: The Gingerbread Man Runs Away
desc: Discuss the gingerbread man's escape from the old woman and his famous running away chant.
prompt_en: Describe the gingerbread man's escape and what he says while running away.
prompt_zh: 描述薑餅人逃跑的過程，以及他跑步時說了什麼話。
sample_questions: What did the gingerbread man say when he ran away?
Who chased the gingerbread man after he escaped?
Why couldn't anyone catch the gingerbread man?

title: Chases by the Cow, Pig, and Hen
desc: Learn about the animals that chased the gingerbread man and how he responded to each of them.
prompt_en: Who chased the gingerbread man after the old woman, and how did he react to each one?
prompt_zh: 除了老婦人之外，還有哪些動物追趕薑餅人？他對每個動物有什麼反應？
sample_questions: How did the gingerbread man respond to the cow?
What did the pig say to the gingerbread man?
Why did the hen want to catch the gingerbread man?

title: The Encounter with the Fox
desc: Explore the gingerbread man's meeting with the fox and what happened at the river.
prompt_en: Explain the gingerbread man's encounter with the fox and what the fox offered to do.
prompt_zh: 說明薑餅人遇見狐狸的情況，以及狐狸提出了什麼幫助。
sample_questions: Why was the gingerbread man scared of the river?
What did the fox say to the gingerbread man?
How did the fox help the gingerbread man cross the river?

title: The Gingerbread Man's End
desc: Discuss the ending of the story where the fox tricks and eats the gingerbread man.
prompt_en: Describe how the story of the gingerbread man ends with the fox.
prompt_zh: 描述薑餅人故事的結局，狐狸是如何欺騙並吃掉薑餅人的。
sample_questions: What did the fox do after helping the gingerbread man cross the river?
Why did the gingerbread man trust the fox?
What lesson can we learn from the gingerbread man's story?
